com.anotherservice.rest.core

Class Responder

  • Object
    • Responder

  • public class Responder
extends Object
    This class is part of the REST service and handles the response sent to the client.
    It relies on the Config key : com.anotherservice.rest.core.formatParameter (if not set, defaultFormatter is used).
    Author:
    Simon Uyttendaele

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ThreadLocal<String> contentType
      The response MIME type to set as Content-Type header in the response.

        Note:

      • decodeCharset

      • send

        public static void send(Object result)
        Formats and sends the provided result.

        If the result is an Exception, it is handled separately and sent.
        If the result is a Handler, the help for that instance is sent.
        If the result is an InputStream, the output format is ignored and the data is sent as a download.
        Any other Object is handled by the current format encoder and sent as plain text.

        Parameters:
        result - the result to send
        Note:
        You should not need to call this method manually. The Servlet does it for you. The only valid *discouraged* reason may be to send partial content.
